answers.answer: Im a first time mom Also due in December.  December 21st with a baby girl.....
I'm due December 16th, when I was pregnant with my daughter I had her at 38 weeks. :)
December 26th, with a boy. I am also a first time mom :)

Im due Dec 19th with my second. I have a 4yr old boy and now were expecting a little girl. I never went into labor with my son. I had him at 35weeks by emergency c section due to preeclampsia. But i have always heard that first time moms go over there due date more cuz there body has never experienced this before and the second time around is quicker. But everybody is different.

when i had my first i had her 36 wks all by myself, i went too an appointment && was 100% effaced && 4 cm dialated.im now 32 wks 3 days && have already had my labor stoppped 2 times with this onee.goood luck.(::
I'm due December 15th with a baby boy I had my son at 40+3 and my daughter at 40 wks exactly :) she was born on Dec 21st and my son on sept 20th :)))) tomorrow is his birthday!
@ Texasbby what if your babies share the same birthday this time would you be excited or what?
hi im a first time mummy n my due on December 11th and my birthday is on December 1st  and im having a baby boy
I'm due December 8 and im a ftm also w/ a surprise baby so I can't wait to meet the little one :)
I would be OK I just pray I don't go overdue lol! I wouldn't mind I just would hope my daughter wouldn't be sad but she is so sweet that I don't think she would but I want her to have her own day :)
Im due December 27th with my little boy. Im going to be a single ftm so it will be a struggle.
December 12th with a girl, Leighanna Margaret. Going to be a ftm, and starting to question everything...

Dec.4 with a girl n shes my third I have two beautiful boys 5 & 3 1/2! Cant wait until november since most likely dats when I go in b cuz I was a week early wit my first n two weeks early wit my second:)
December 12th with a little girl, Breighlynn Renee :)
I am due December 1st. I am a FTM having a Baby Girl<3 I cant wait to meet her!:)

I'm scheduled for my csection December 20th =) I'm having a baby girl, Laci Nicole. She's my second baby. I went over almost 3 weeks with my son (first baby). I think everyone's body is different so you'll never know. Did your mother go past her due date? We have a theory in my family. All of our mothers that went past their due dates, the daughters went past their due days as well. Crazy!

question: Any mommy's here due in December?? I'm due Dec 29th my birthdays Dec 19th so I'm hoping I'll have my baby boy  on my birthday or Christmas. I'm a ftm and was wondering do you normally go into labor before or after your duedates?
title: december babies ??
